title: BluFab 9135.PA.March 17,2014.exe.7z
description:
March 17, 2014
IMPORTANT NOTICE: Due to some reasons, 
we have rebranded DVDFab into BluFab, you will get identical or even better features and functionalities. 
Thanks again for your continuous support! Stay with us, and we will not let you down!  

BluFab 9.1.3.5 is out:
Added option to output two audio tracks (HD and non-HD) from one HD audio track for Blu-ray Ripper;

Fixed Blu-ray 3D choppy playback problem on PS3 for Blu-ray Copy;

Fixed a problem that lifetime licenses were registered as expired in certain cases;

Improved user experience of setting output size in Ripper products;

Fixed a problem that the output aspect ratio is incorrect when converting certain video files in Converter products.


___________________________________________________________


This is a pre-activated version as direct executable (exe)

Seems working fine anyway.

___________________________________________________________

How proceeding :

A)disconnect from internet.

B)Uninstall any previous installation with perfect clean by using iobit uninstaller 4 exemple...
(excepted any v 8 build)

C)Install this new one and load it one time still disconnected from internet.

D)Do not accept participation of this program and close BluFab.

E)Reconnect to internet and now enjoy for real whatever you wanna rip so.

___________________________________________________________


Huge thx to its author and more so.


enjoy and seed as long as you can.

Thx and best regards
